verses.name: Daniel 11:33
verses.text: And they that understand among the people shall instruct many: yet they shall fall by the sword, and by flame, by captivity, and by spoil, many days.

verses.name: Daniel 11:34
verses.text: Now when they shall fall, they shall be holpen with a little help: but many shall cleave to them with flatteries.

verses.name: Daniel 11:35
verses.text: And some of them of understanding shall fall, to try them, and to purge, and to make them white, even to the time of the end: because it is yet for a time appointed.
